spec.name: Saada Cinema
spec.description: Saada Cinema (Cin√©ma Saada), meaning 'Happiness Cinema,' is a historical movie theater dating from the **1950s**. Located in the eastern part of the city, its architecture is characterized by the Modernist style popular in post-war construction. Saada Cinema reflects the city's cultural life as it expanded into new neighborhoods. Though currently **closed**, its building was declared a **National Material Patrimony** site in 2018.
